    Classes and interfaces

    XMLForm¶

    Responsible for controlling the form, drawing, calling the validator, adding "Items" and "ItemLists", and navigating through formsets.

    « More »

    XMLFormUtils¶

    Convenience methods for XML Form.

    « More »

    XMLFormValidator¶

    The Form Validator class, responsible for reading and validating form elements. This class is replicated in JS for client-side validation.

    « More »

    XMLSelect¶

    Responsible for formatting db data into select list elements.

    « More »
